About Me


Hi, I am Nikhil ,
With 6+ years of experience in developing, deploying and designing AI and Machine Learning solutions, I am currently providing freelance services to ideate, implement, and productionize AI/ML solutions for businesses who want to leverage Machine Learning techniques to solve/automate or improve their existing business processes.

I can apply Deep learning techniques to wide breadth of technical domains including Natural Language Processing, Computer Vision, Custom speech recognition & generation, Content based recommendation, Time series based recommendation and forecasting and Semi-supervised learning.

Have real world exposure in dealing with variety of business domains especially in Entertainment, Sales, Healthcare and Life Sciences. My computer science academic background and extensive experience in working with Linux operating system helps me to be very productive and time efficient when debugging problems that may arise unexpectedly in the course of challenging projects.

Do checkout My Services to understand in what ways I can be of help to you.

My Employment and Educational Journey is summarized below:

Independent consultant

Nov 2022 — Current

  • Consulting clients on application of Machine Learning techniques to solve their business problems
  • Building Proof of concepts and prototypes leveraging Deep Learning concepts

Senior Machine Learning Engineer, Quantiphi, inc

Jun 2018 — Apr 2022

  • Developed and deployed into production Deep learning based solutions for our clients
  • Building solution architectures and planning project roadmaps for upcoming client projects
  • Leading Applied Research projects for developing customizable Machine Learning pipelines to help expedite client project deliveries

Student, Indian Institute of Technology Dhanbad, India

Jun 2016 — May 2018

  • Master of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering with Specialization in Information Security
  • Graduate Teaching Assistant in Object Oriented Programming lab and Software Engineering Lab
  • Assisted more than 100 undergraduate students in lab work, helped in designing lab work assignments and evaluated students' assignments

Assistant Manager (Systems), State Bank of India, Mumbai

May 2013 — Jun 2016

  • Data Analytics and reports generation support to bank executives and branches
  • Designed and developed Internal Web Applications and portals to automate existing manual processes

Student, University of Pune, Nashik India

Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science
